channel.title: Need help on npc attacking
channel.description: ok well i had an idea that i remember from real rs in members world the khazards and the gnomes in the battlefield fighting each other i wanted to know if u can do that with the private servers i really would like to do something like that for my server if any1 can help post here ty (dont take my idea plz o.o) and if any1 can i also wanted to know how do i make certain items turn u into a npc like ruby ring turns u into fire elemental (again my idea dont take) any1 got any help plz ty and post here dont flame..
